turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm feeling really lost in my career right now. I've been in the same role for five years and I'm not sure where to go next.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. That's a common feeling. To help you, I'd like to ask a few questions to get a better sense of your situation. First, what is your current role and field?

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: The idea of a completely different field is both exciting and terrifying. I'm not sure where to even begin. It's overwhelming.

turns.speaker: agent
